wikipedia_page.main: Gordon Jones (born 6 March 1943) is an English former professional footballer who made 547 appearances in the Football League as a left-back for Middlesbrough and Darlington. Jones made more post-war appearances for Middlesbrough than any other player and second only to Tim Williamson in the club's long history. He went on to coach at non-league club Crook Town.
